Accuracy.description: Measure of correctness in the translation and adherence to the provided rules

Completeness.description: Extent to which the solution covers all aspects of the problem

Reasoning Clarity.description: Ease of following the reasoning trail the agents have used

accepted_values.Clear: Reasoning process is easily traceable and understandable
accepted_values.Somewhat Clear: Reasoning process is somewhat traceable but might have ambiguous parts
accepted_values.Unclear: Reasoning process is confusing or not traceable

Efficiency.description: Efficiency in terms of the number of steps and time taken to reach the solution

accepted_values.High Efficiency: Solution reached with minimum steps in shortest time
accepted_values.Medium Efficiency: Solution reached with reasonable steps and time
accepted_values.Low Efficiency: Solution requires many steps and takes long time

Response to Correction.description: Measure of how well the system can correct itself when given feedback

accepted_values.Good: Corrects errors with minor follow-up needed
accepted_values.Poor: Struggles to correct errors even with feedback

Creativity.description: Indicator of originality and creativity in problem-solving approach

accepted_values.Not Creative: Approach is commonplace and lacks originality
